**手术刀**（scalpel）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[近战](/index.php?title=%E8%BF%91%E6%88%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "近战 (page does not exist)")[武器](/wiki/%E6%AD%A6%E5%99%A8 "武器")。它使用[小刀](/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E5%88%80 "小刀")[技能](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%80%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "技能 (page does not exist)")，由[金属](/index.php?title=%E9%87%91%E5%B1%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "金属 (page does not exist)")制成。

[ ]

## 生成

手术刀不会随机生成。

[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")在开始游戏时会获得一把[+0](/index.php?title=%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "附魔 (page does not exist)")手术刀作为起始武器[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F%EF%BC%88%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生（玩家怪物） (page does not exist)")职业的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")有1⁄16（6.25%）的概率获得一把手术刀作为他们的[起始武器](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

## 描述

不同于其他小刀类武器，手术刀并不适用于[投掷](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%95%E6%8E%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "投掷 (page does not exist)")攻击，投掷手术刀进行攻击会有-2[命中](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E4%B8%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命中 (page does not exist)")的惩罚，但是，手术刀可以[多重射击](/index.php?title=%E5%A4%9A%E9%87%8D%E5%B0%84%E5%87%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "多重射击 (page does not exist)")[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

## 策略

手术刀是很弱的武器，杀伤力和[兽人匕首](/wiki/%E5%85%BD%E4%BA%BA%E5%8C%95%E9%A6%96 "兽人匕首")相近。其唯一的优势就是使用防[侵蚀](/index.php?title=%E4%BE%B5%E8%9A%80\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "侵蚀 (page does not exist)")的材料制成。而且相较于匕首之类的发射物，小刀不仅更少见，伤害也更低。医生起始拥有的手术刀适合作为备用武器，用于对付诸如[酸滴](/index.php?title=%E9%85%B8%E6%BB%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "酸滴 (page does not exist)")之类会腐蚀武器的怪物。只要你获得了一堆小刀，或者获得了一把防侵蚀，威力更高的主武器，你就可以把手术刀贮藏起来或者干脆丢掉了。

在游戏早期，医生角色可以通过用手术刀攻击[气体孢子](/index.php?title=%E6%B0%94%E4%BD%93%E5%AD%A2%E5%AD%90\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "气体孢子 (page does not exist)")来锻炼小刀的武器技能，只需要用听诊器随时监控气体孢子的生命值，避免它被击杀就行。

## 历史

手术刀首次出现于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")。

旧版本存在一个漏洞，会导致医生职业怪物生成时获得一堆手术刀，此漏洞在[NetHack 3.6.2](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.2 "NetHack 3.6.2")修复。

## 起源

[![维基百科](/images/thumb/f/f8/Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png/50px-Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png)](/wiki/File:Fair-use-wikipedia-logo.png "维基百科")

[维基百科](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/zh:Main_Page "wikipedia:zh:Main Page")相关条目：

***[Scalpel](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Search/Scalpel "wikipedia:Special:Search/Scalpel")***

手术刀是一种非常锐利的小型刀具，被广泛用于外科手术、解剖，以及各种手艺制作当中。两边开刃的手术刀也被称为“柳叶刀”（lancet）。根据不同使用场景的需要，手术刀也分为一次性使用和可重复使用的类型。

手术刀的刃一般由淬火钢和回火钢、不锈钢或高碳钢制成。由于钢制刀刃在进行核磁共振引导的外科手术时不能使用，因此也存在由银、钛、陶瓷、金刚石甚至黑曜石制成的手术刀。

在历史上，人类早在数千年前就有过在医疗领域应用手术刀的例子——人们曾在土耳其境内一个公元前22世纪的青铜时代聚落遗址中发现用黑曜石制成的手术刀，并且在同一地点发现了存在脑外科手术痕迹的同年代头骨。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Scalpel/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), Healers can use cure [sickness](/wiki/Sickness "Sickness") or [sliming](/wiki/Sliming "Sliming") using the [surgery](/wiki/Surgery "Surgery") [technique](/wiki/Technique "Technique") with a carried scalpel, making them a bit more useful.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), Healers also apply their [healing spell](/wiki/Healing_spell "Healing spell") skill level as bonuses to to-hit and damage when attacking with scalpels (+0 at Basic, +2 at Skilled, +3 at Expert). At maximum skill, a scalpel is roughly equivalent to other starting weapons in the hands of a Healer, though it is still outperformed by a [unicorn horn](/wiki/Unicorn_horn "Unicorn horn") or [quarterstaff](/wiki/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff") at high [strength](/wiki/Strength "Strength").

All [nurses](/wiki/Nurse "Nurse") in dNetHack are generated with scalpels, as are some [deminymphs](/wiki/Deminymph "Deminymph"). Several hostile nurses in the [Madman quest](/wiki/Madman_quest "Madman quest") are generated wielding [sickness](/wiki/Sickness "Sickness")-poisoned scalpels.

### xNetHack

In [xNetHack](/wiki/XNetHack "XNetHack"), scalpels are made stronger and deal 1d5 damage versus small monsters and 1d7 damage versus large one. Nurses have a 1⁄5 chance of generating with a scalpel.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), a scalpel can be made at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") by combining a knife and a [stiletto](/wiki/Stiletto "Stiletto").

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM changes, the [Undertaker](/wiki/Undertaker "Undertaker") role starts with a +2 scalpel as their weapon. Player monster undertakers are always generated with scalpels.

## 百科文本

A scalpel is a very sharp knife used for surgery ... Merely  
touching a medical scalpel with bare hands to test it will  
cut through the skin. ... Medical scalpel blades are gradually  
curved for greater precision when cutting through tissue.

\[ Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia ]

2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 192](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L192)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/dothrow.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 117](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dothrow.c#L117)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/dothrow.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 1066](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/dothrow.c#L1066)

医生在开始游戏时会获得一把+0手术刀作为起始武器[1]。

医生职业的玩家怪物有1⁄16（6.25%）的概率获得一把手术刀作为他们的起始武器[2]。

不同于其他小刀类武器，手术刀并不适用于投掷攻击，投掷手术刀进行攻击会有-2命中的惩罚，但是，手术刀可以多重射击[3][4][5]。

在游戏早期，医生角色可以通过用手术刀攻击气体孢子来锻炼小刀的武器技能，只需要用听诊器随时监控气体孢子的生命值，避免它被击杀就行。

旧版本存在一个漏洞，会导致医生职业怪物生成时获得一堆手术刀，此漏洞在NetHack 3.6.2修复。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], Healers can use cure [[sickness]] or [[sliming]] using the [[surgery]] [[technique]] with a carried scalpel, making them a bit more useful.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]], Healers also apply their [[healing spell]] skill level as bonuses to to-hit and damage when attacking with scalpels (+0 at Basic, +2 at Skilled, +3 at Expert). At maximum skill, a scalpel is roughly equivalent to other starting weapons in the hands of a Healer, though it is still outperformed by a [[unicorn horn]] or [[quarterstaff]] at high [[strength]].

All [[nurse]]s in dNetHack are generated with scalpels, as are some [[deminymph]]s. Several hostile nurses in the [[Madman quest]] are generated wielding [[sickness]]-poisoned scalpels.

===xNetHack===
In [[xNetHack]], scalpels are made stronger and deal 1d5 damage versus small monsters and 1d7 damage versus large one. Nurses have a {{frac|5}} chance of generating with a scalpel. 

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], a scalpel can be made at a [[Forge (dungeon feature)|forge]] by combining a knife and a [[stiletto]].

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM changes, the [[Undertaker]] role starts with a +2 scalpel as their weapon. Player monster undertakers are always generated with scalpels.
